{-# LANGUAGE TemplateHaskell #-}
{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}

module Koshucode.Baala.Vanilla.Relmap
( koshu
, vanillaRelmaps
) where
import Koshucode.Baala.Vanilla.Relmap.Basic as Basic
import Koshucode.Baala.Vanilla.Value.Relval
import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Kit as Kit
import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Syntax as Syn

-- | Quasiquoter for @[koshu| ... |]@.
koshu :: Kit.QuasiQuoter
koshu = Kit.koshuQuoter vanillaHalf [| vanillaFull |]

-- relmap constructors
vanillaHalf :: Kit.RelmapHalfCons
vanillaFull :: Kit.RelmapWholeCons Val
(Kit.ConsRelmap vanillaHalf vanillaFull) = Kit.makeConsRelmap vanillaRelmaps

-- ----------------------  Operators

-- | Implementation of relational operators.
vanillaRelmaps :: [Kit.RelmapImplement Val]
vanillaRelmaps = minimalRelmaps ++ vanillaRelmapsAddition

vanillaRelmapsAddition :: [Kit.RelmapImplement Val]
vanillaRelmapsAddition = relmaps relmapParsers
    -- Relmap operators in alphabetical order
    [ ("hold -"   , makeHold   , ["hold EXP ..."])
    , ("maybe R"  , makeMaybe  , ["maybe RELMAP ...",
                                  "maybe RELMAP ... -share /NAME ..."])
    , ("rdf SRC"  , makeRdf    , ["rdf SIGN /SBJ /OBJ"])
    , ("unhold -" , makeUnhold , ["unhold EXP ..."])
    , ("val -"    , makeVal    , ["val /NEW EXP ..."])
    ]



-- ----------------------  Constructors

makeHold :: Kit.RelmapFullCons Val
makeHold = makeHoldFor "hold" (==)

makeUnhold :: Kit.RelmapFullCons Val
makeUnhold = makeHoldFor "unhold" (/=)

makeHoldFor :: String -> (Val -> Val -> Bool) -> Kit.RelmapFullCons Val
makeHoldFor op test _ h = do
  let opd = Kit.halfOperand h
  term <- opd <!!> "term"
  Right $ Kit.calc h op (holdBody test $ Syn.Branch 0 term) []

makeMaybe :: Kit.RelmapFullCons Val
makeMaybe ms h = do
  m <- relmapHead ms
  Right $ Basic.maybe h m

makeRdf :: Kit.RelmapFullCons Val
makeRdf _ h = do
  let opd = Kit.halfOperand h
  sign  <- relmapSign opd
  term  <- opd <!!> "term"
  [s,o] <- Syn.termNames term
  Right $ relmapSource h sign ["/s", "/o"]
            `mappend` relmapRename h [(s,"/s"), (o,"/o")]

makeVal :: Kit.RelmapFullCons Val
makeVal _ h = do
  let opd = Kit.halfOperand h
  term <- opd <!!> "term"
  Right $ Kit.calc h "val" (valBody term) []
